subject: Off Topic : Hot Job. SQA Gurus w Java Reqd. Top MNCs. Bangalore
msgSnippet: Hi, This is an urgent requirement.  Our clients, TOP MNCs in Bangalore, India are seeking top notch Testing professionals .  Details below. Only those who meet
messageBody:
Hi,
This is an urgent requirement. Our clients, TOP MNCs in Bangalore,
India are seeking top notch Testing professionals . Details below.
Only those who meet all the requirements are requested to send in
their resumes to Jobs@.... Please do not post to the group.
Also please do not forget to write the "Job Code" in the subject line.

Thanks.
John Amirtharaj
Alphaeus HR
Phone : +91 080 51216414 to 17
Email : jobs@ alphaeus.com

========================
1. SQA Manager (Job Code :SQAMA2301)
2. SQA Engineer (Job Code :SQAEA2301)
3. Lead - Testing (Embedded Technologies) (Job Code :QAETS2301)
4. QA-Engineer Platform QA Server (Job Code :QASVRA2301)
5. QA-Engineer Platform QA Tools (Job Code :QAtoolsA2301)
6. Leader - SQA :SILKTEST (Job Code :HDSLK1601)
7. QA Engineer - SAP

===============

1. SQA Manager (Job Code :SQAMA2301)

Knowledge and Skills:

1.Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science from PREMIER
Colleges (RECs/IITs)
2.8+ years of SQA experience that includes 2+ years as a SQA Manager.
3.Excellent technical, analytical, people management and
communication skills.
4.Knowledge of Configuration Management and Bug tracking tools.
5.Strong knowledge/experience with software testing methodologies and
processes.
6.Technically competent in web application technologies (XML, J2EE),
database technologies (Oracle, SQL Server or DB2),
platforms (Unix and Windows).
7.Experience with object-oriented programming and methodologies (Java
and/or C++).
8.Experience with testing tools such as JUnit, JProbe, WinRunner,
LoadRunner.
9.Knowledge/experience in commercial application servers such as
WebLogic or Webphere.

Responsibilities:
1.Manage an offshore QA team that performs all testing activities
including manual, programmatic API and
installation/migration testing.
2.Responsible for successful testing to ensure that the software is
delivered with high quality.
3.Establish and improve best practices in quality assurance, working
with other QA groups.
4.Encourage continued improvements in proficiency and efficiency of
QA engineers through vision and objective setting, and
hands-on mentoring, including technical areas.
5.Effectively communicate status, metrics and issues on a regular
basis
=============================================

2. SQA Engineer (Job Code :SQAEA2301)

Knowledge and Skills:

1.Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
2.3+ years of Testing experience
3.Atleast 1 year of experience in developing automation suites for
web application testing using Win Runner
4.Ability to design test plans and execute test procedures for web
and J2EE compliant applications.
5.Experience with testing enterprise level applications deployed on
Windows and UNIX platforms.
6.Experience with HTML/XML and familiarity with Perl/shell scripting.
7.Sound knowledge of software testing methodologies and processes
including automation concepts.
8.Working knowledge of RDBMS such as Oracle, SQL Server or DB2.
9.Knowledge of Configuration Management and Bug tracking tools.

Preferred Skills:
1.1 year of software programming experience using C/C++/Java.
2.Knowledge and / or experience of test automation tools such as Load
Runner.
3.Functional knowledge of ERP's, e-Procurement, Supply Chain
Management etc.

Responsibilities:
1.Develop automation scripts to maximize test coverage and improve
test efficiency using Win Runner.
2.Perform functional, usability and automated testing for Buyer.
3.Write fully functional test plans and test procedures.
4.Track and analyze results of the tests and work closely with the
software developers to isolate and reproduce defects.
5.Communicate testing status and issues on a regular basis.
6.Configure the necessary test environment including installation and
management of web server, application server, database
server and web browsers.
7.Interact closely with members of cross-functional feature teams for
product success.
===============================================

3. Testing Lead (Embedded Technologies) (Job Code :QAETS2301)

Responsibilities:

Domain : networking (TCPIP, Routing, VLAN, QoS, IPSec, NAT, ACL, L2
Protocols ) Person should be familiar with protocol testing,
preferably in Layer2 and Layer3 protocols testing. Hands on
experience in the scripting language for L2/L3 switches and routers.

Skill : Tcl / Tk ; Perl

Automation of test process Writing system & integration test plans &
scripts Executing tests & reporting to Developer.

Preferences:
1.MSCS or MSEE a plus.
2.Exposure to embedded platforms
3.Exposure to RFCs & MIBS
4.Cisco Certified Professional/CCIE
5.Exposure to the software lab setup environment Experience with
scripting languages (e.g., BASH, PERL, etc.)

Requirements:

1.Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor of
Engineering/Technology in Computer Science/Information Technology or
equivalent. RECs/IITs Preferred.
2.At least 6 to 8 years of overall software testing experience.
3.3+ years of scripting experience in one or more of the following:
Perl, TCL/Tk, Expect.
4.Experience in protocol feature testing on Ethernet switches and/or
IP router.
5.Applicants should be Indian citizens or hold relevant residence
status. Prefer Candidates from Bangalore, India

========================================
4. QA-Engineer Platform QA Server (Job Code :QASVRA2301)

Knowledge and Skills:

1.Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
2.Experience in White box testing
3.years of experience with strong understanding of object-oriented
methodologies and programming in Java and/or C++.
4.Ability to design test plans and execute test procedures for web
and J2EE compliant applications.
5.Experience with testing enterprise level applications deployed on
Windows and UNIX platforms.
6.Strong knowledge of commercial enterprise database such as Oracle,
DB2 or Microsoft SQL Server.
7.Knowledge/experience with software testing methodologies and
processes.
8.Strong preference for experience with commercial application
servers like WebLogic or WebSphere.
9.Knowledge of Configuration Management and Bug tracking tools.
10.Knowledge/experience of XML, Perl, Shell and/or other scripting
language.


Responsibilities:

1.Design, implement, and execute functional, system, stress and
performance tests for Platform server features. Develop API
tests for Server components and APIs and executing these tests
across various platforms and databases.
2.Track and analyze results of the tests and work closely with the
software developers to analyze code hotspots, test
coverage, and defect discovery and resolution.
3.Maintain and enhance existing test tools and processes, and
implement new ones as needed. Help to continuously improve
testing and product quality.
4.Write fully functional test plans and test procedures.
5.Communicate testing status and issues on a regular basis.
6.Configure the necessary test environment including installation and
management of web server, application server, database
server and web browsers.
7.Develop automation scripts to maximize test coverage and improve
test efficiency.
8.Interact closely with members of cross-functional feature teams for
product success



==============================
5. QA-Engineer Platform QA Tools (Job Code :QAToolsA2301)

Knowledge and Skills:

1.Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
2.Knowledge/experience of Perl, Shell and/or other scripting language
3.3+ years of SQA experience with strong understanding of object-
oriented methodologies and programming in Java
and/or C++.
4.Experience with testing enterprise level applications deployed on
Windows and UNIX platforms.
5.Hands-on of one or more databases including Oracle, DB2 or
Microsoft SQL Server.
6.Experience in Black-box testing
7.Knowledge/experience with software testing methodologies and
processes.
8.Experience with application servers such as WebLogic or WebSphere
desired.

Responsibilities:

1.Perform migrations of Buyer product with different configurations,
i.e. databases, ERPs, application servers.
2.Work closely with development to report and resolve defects in
migration process.
3.Migrate customer instances that include customizations.
4.Test the Buyer installation process including installing Tibco, and
Buyer, doing configuration, and performing database
initialization.
5.Design, implement, and execute functional, system, stress and
performance tests for installation and migration features.
6.Track and analyze results of the tests and work closely with the
software developers to analyze code hotspots, test
coverage, and defect discovery and resolution.
7.Write fully functional test plans and test procedures.
8.Communicate testing status and issues on a regular basis.
9.Develop automation scripts to maximize test coverage and improve
test efficiency.
10.Interact closely with members of cross-functional feature teams
for product success.


====================================

7. Lead -Silk Testing Job Code: HdSlk1601

Requirements:

Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor of Engineering/Technology
or
Master of Engineering/Technology in Computer Science/Information
Technology
or equivalent.

Required skill(s): Silk test.
1.At least 6 year(s) of working experience in the related field is
required for this position.
2.Applicants should be Indian citizens or hold relevant residence
status.
3.Preferably managers specializing in IT/Computer - Software or
equivalent.
4.Full-Time positions available.
5.To ensure compliance to the laid down procedures and ensure defect
free software person
should play the role of a guide and mentor to the team.
6.The person should be capable to create / verify Test Plans, Test
Cases, Automation &Manual testing.
7.Understand PRD,Specs Docs.Verify and track the tasks and ensure
completion.
Reporting to be proper and timely to QA Manager Director.
8.Extensive Exp in SILK Testing.Exp inweb & aplication
server,Oracle,Bug tracking & configartion tools.
===============================================
